definition: Heilongjiang province (Heilungkiang) in northeast China, abbr. 黑, capital Harbin 哈尔滨/Heilongjiang river forming the border between northeast China and Russia/Amur river
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
black/dark/sinister/secret/shady/illegal/to hide (sth) away/to vilify/(loanword) to hack (computing)
dragon/CL:條|条[tiao2]/imperial
surname Long
river/CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]
surname Jiang
Heilongjiang Province (Heilungkiang) in northeast China, abbr. 黑, capital Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1]
Heilongjiang River/Amur River (the border between northeast China and Russia)

sentences.english: Heilongjiang river has the abundant water resources in boundary block, the engineering condition is superior.
sentences.chinese: 黑龙江干流界河段水力资源丰富，工程条件优越。

sentences.english: A practitioner surnamed Zheng, from a county of Heilongjiang, still practices Falun Gong secretly.
sentences.chinese: 一名来自黑龙江某县姓郑的练习者仍然在秘密练功。

sentences.english: Introduce the famous historical and cultural city in Hei Long jiang ?
sentences.chinese: 请介绍一下黑龙江省的国家及省级历史文化名城？

sentences.english: Dead Siberian tiger found in NE China.
sentences.chinese: 黑龙江密山发现成年野生东北虎尸体。

sentences.english: Heilongjiang province science department three forms enter take a fraction be?
sentences.chinese: 黑龙江省理科三表入取分数是？

sentences.english: Poplar crinkle disease is a new discovered in artificial poplar forest in Heilongjiang province.
sentences.chinese: 杨树皱叶病是在黑龙江省杨树人工林中新发现的病害。

sentences.english: Zhalong is a nature reserve in Heilongjiang in north-east China.
sentences.chinese: 扎龙是中国东北部黑龙江的一个自然保护区。

sentences.english: The paper is about the distribution of Heilongjiang dialect and typical phoneme.
sentences.chinese: 文章讨论了黑龙江方言的分区以及代表音系。

sentences.english: Introduce the situation of Hei Long jiang ? Model : HeiLongjiang named “Sahalian Wula” in Manchu language.
I am 23 years old, and I come from Heilongjiang province.
sentences.chinese: 我的名字叫于涛，今年23岁，是黑龙江人。

sentences.english: I feel very lucky that I can come to the HIU.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我很幸运能来到黑龙江外国语学院。

sentences.english: The production level of rice is positive correlation with the active accumulated temperature apparently in Heilongjiang province.
sentences.chinese: 黑龙江省稻谷产量水平与活动积温呈显著正相关。

sentences.english: A rhizosphere actinomycete (Z01) was isolated from soybean root soil in Heilongjiang province, PRC.
sentences.chinese: 根际链霉菌Z01分离自黑龙江的大豆根际土壤。

sentences.english: The use of grounding wires in the Heilongjiang electric power system is described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了黑龙江省电力系统接地线使用的状况。

sentences.english: Only a couple of hours later, the blaze had quickly spread to the neighboring Heilongjiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 仅仅几小时后，火舌便迅速窜到了临近的黑龙江省。

sentences.english: Sanxing, the ancient place name, is Yilan County of Heilongjiang Province today.
sentences.chinese: 三姓，古地名，今黑龙江省依兰县。
